author: jimmyca15
body:
The Set-LocalGroup command imposes a length maximum of 48 characters. If I use `net localgroup <groupname> /comment:"<Here is where I put my description>"` I can go far past 48 characters. This restriction seems unreasonable especially given that you cannot replicate the descriptions of builtin groups such as the local 'Administrators' group which has a description containing 75 characters.

Local Administrators description (75 chars)
Administrators have complete and unrestricted access to the computer/domain

comments.author: vors
mirichmo
comments.body:
I verified that Win 7 accepts descriptions greater than 48 characters, so I'll remove the check and let the SAM API validate string length.

The check got added because of [out-of-date documentation](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb490706.aspx) on TechNet.

title: Set-LocalGroup Description Limitation
